[BILLIONAIRE HERO Billionaire Bikers MC]9-the billionaire bikers mc , 3 Sam Crescent Copyright © 2017

Chapter One [Lewis Cox]10-lewis looked out at [the city]59-the city from [[his]10-lewis penthouse apartment]60-his penthouse apartment . Night had already fallen , and [he]10-lewis held a glass of whiskey in [his]10-lewis hand . [He]10-lewis was tired . No , [he]10-lewis was exhausted . [The town]61-the town looked beautiful with the glow from the street lights . Winter was nearly upon [them]62-them . In a couple of weeks , it would be Halloween , then on to Thanksgiving , to end the year with Christmas . [He]10-lewis took a sip of [his]10-lewis drink , and saw past the glitz and glamor of [the city]59-the city . At the heart of it , there was a cancer . [The city]59-the city held a multitude of sins no matter where [anyone]65-anyone went . [People]66-people wanting stuff [they]66-people really should n’t have . Just three nights ago , [he]10-lewis and [the men in [the MC club [he]10-lewis was part of]68-the mc club he was part of]67-the men in the mc club he was part of , [the Billionaire Bikers MC]9-the billionaire bikers mc , had done another interception of [stolen girls]69-stolen girls . That was what [the club]70-the club did . [They]71-they stopped the trafficking of [women]72-women . At least , [they]71-they tried to stop it . It had been during a rescue that [Russ]11-russ , [one of [the men who ’d helped [him]10-lewis form [the club]70-the club]74-the men who ’d helped him form the club]73-one of the men who ’d helped him form the club , found [[his]10-lewis woman]76-his woman , [Anna]12-anna . The more [women]72-women [they]71-they failed to rescue , the more information [he]10-lewis discovered , [he]10-lewis realized there was no way to stop [women]72-women from being taken . [Men]79-men wanted [them]72-women . [People]66-people wanted to exploit [them]72-women . In the back of [his]10-lewis mind [he]10-lewis still saw [Mandy]13-mandy , ten years old , screaming [his]10-lewis name as [she]13-mandy was dragged into the back of [a waiting car]81-a waiting car . [Sweet , trusting Mandy]13-mandy . [She]13-mandy ’d been [[his]10-lewis best friend ’s sister]82-his best friend ’s sister , [[his]10-lewis neighbor]83-his neighbor , and [he]10-lewis ’d been asked to keep an eye on [her]13-mandy . It was [his]10-lewis biggest failure . Downing [his]10-lewis whiskey , [he]10-lewis held the empty glass and glared out across [the city]59-the city . [No one]85-no one had been able to find [her]13-mandy . [The men who took [her]13-mandy]86-the men who took her had kept [her]13-mandy hidden , and then of course , time passed . [People]66-people moved on . [She]13-mandy was probably dead . It was usual to keep on hoping for a sign that would n’t turn up . [Lewis]10-lewis had n’t stopped hoping . [He]10-lewis did n’t give up .

[He]10-lewis kept on fighting . [No one else]88-no one else had any hope , but [he]10-lewis did . There was no way [he]10-lewis was going to give up hope without a dead body to prove to [him]10-lewis that [he]10-lewis had to stop . So [he]10-lewis went to college . Every second of every single day , [he]10-lewis ’d worked [his]10-lewis ass off to be the best that [he]10-lewis could be . Before [Mandy]13-mandy had been taken , [he]10-lewis ’d been [a jock who partied and did n’t give a shit about [his]10-lewis grades]89-a jock who partied and did n’t give a shit about his grades . Within weeks of [her]13-mandy leaving , that all changed . [He]10-lewis was [an intelligent guy]90-an intelligent guy . [School]91-school had n’t interested [him]10-lewis , but playing around and football had . With [Mandy]13-mandy being gone , [he]10-lewis had a mission . After a year of [her]13-mandy being gone , [he]10-lewis ’d realized that [no one else]88-no one else gave a shit . The case had turned cold , and unless there was a call in or something , [no one]85-no one was going to keep spending time or [the taxpayers]94-the taxpayers ’ money to go looking for [a missing kid]95-a missing kid . It had been a wake - up call . After that , [he]10-lewis realized the only way [he]10-lewis was going to find [Mandy]13-mandy was to do it [himself]10-lewis . [[His]10-lewis family]96-his family had been … well off . Not rich . [[His]10-lewis dad]97-his dad had been and still was [a lawyer]98-a lawyer . [He]10-lewis ’d not seen [them]96-his family in over ten years . Not since [[his]10-lewis parents]99-his parents told [him]10-lewis [he]10-lewis needed to let it go . That [he]10-lewis should focus on [his]10-lewis own needs . If [he]10-lewis ’d accept that [Mandy]13-mandy was dead , [he]10-lewis could finally live [his]10-lewis own life . When [they]99-his parents ’d tried to have [him]10-lewis medically examined , that was the last straw . [He]10-lewis never went back . [He]10-lewis ’d built [[his]10-lewis empire]100-his empire , [Cox Industries]1-cox industries , from the ground up . From that point , [he]10-lewis found [Russell Wyatt]11-russ , [a man who had [no family]102-no family]101-a man who had no family , and along with [him]11-russ and [eight other men]103-eight other men , [he]10-lewis ’d founded [the Billionaire Bikers MC]104-the billionaire bikers mc . To some [they]105-they were a joke , something to be laughed at and mocked . Not to [Lewis]10-lewis . It had been [his]10-lewis base to do what [he]10-lewis wanted to do all along . To find [Mandy]13-mandy . [No one else]88-no one else was willing to spend money on the case . So [he]10-lewis got rich and gave [himself]10-lewis the money to use to find [her]13-mandy [himself]10-lewis . The idea had been crazy , until [he]10-lewis ’d earned [his]10-lewis first million . That one million became ten within a year . From ten , fifty , and it just kept going up and up , until [he]10-lewis was finally wealthy enough to do whatever the hell [he]10-lewis wanted . The thing about [traffickers]107-traffickers was [they]107-traffickers lived on the wrong side of the law , but [several of [them]107-traffickers]108-several of them had [contacts in [law enforcement]110-law enforcement]109-contacts in law enforcement . [They]107-traffickers paid [men]79-men to look the other way . So [Lewis]10-lewis started to throw more money than [they]79-men did . [His]10-lewis whiskey glass was empty . [He]10-lewis turned around to fill it up , and froze . There was [Mandy]13-mandy , [the woman that had started it all]112-the woman that had started it all . [She]13-mandy was dressed in a pair of cute peach - colored pajamas . [Her]13-mandy now - black hair stood out against [her]13-mandy pale skin . “ How long have [you]13-mandy been standing [there]1320-there ? ”[10-lewis] [he]10-lewis asked . “ [I]10-lewis could ask [you]13-mandy the same thing . ”[10-lewis] [The men who had taken [Mandy]13-mandy]113-the men who had taken mandy had beaten [her]13-mandy to a bloody pulp because [they]113-the men who had taken mandy discovered [she]13-mandy ’d anonymously been helping [the Billionaire Bikers MC]104-the billionaire bikers mc to rescue [the women [the trafficking ring]116-the trafficking ring wanted to sell]115-the women the trafficking ring wanted to sell . [Lewis]10-lewis was n’t [an idiot]117-an idiot . [He]10-lewis knew the darkness within [her]13-mandy eyes was because for a little while [she]13-mandy ’d helped [them]113-the men who had taken mandy find [the girls]118-the girls . [Mandy]13-mandy over the years had lost hope , so [she]13-mandy ’d made sure [[her]13-mandy kidnappers]119-her kidnappers , [the monsters who held [her]13-mandy]120-the monsters who held her , trusted [her]13-mandy . [She]13-mandy became part of what [he]10-lewis despised , and then purely because [she]13-mandy ’d seen a picture , it had all turned around . [Mandy]13-mandy had turned that knowledge against [[her]13-mandy captors]121-her captors . [She]13-mandy knew the best locations to keep [girls]122-girls , where [they]113-the men who had taken mandy ’d try to find [women that did n’t get noticed]123-women that did n’t get noticed , how to go under the radar , even warning [them]113-the men who had taken mandy about [some of [the cops that could afford to look the other way]125-the cops that could afford to look the other way while [men smuggled shipments]126-men smuggled shipments out]124-some of the cops that could afford to look the other way while men smuggled shipments out . When [her]13-mandy memory finally returned , [her]13-mandy knowledge had helped [them]113-the men who had taken mandy to save [so many women]127-so many women . [Lewis]10-lewis did n’t doubt for a second that [she]13-mandy was a valuable asset , and it had taken [the club]70-the club a lot of money to try to keep [her]13-mandy identity a secret . [He]10-lewis did n’t want [anyone]65-anyone to find out who [she]13-mandy was . As far as [the men who ’d taken [her]13-mandy]130-the men who ’d taken her were concerned , [Mandy]13-mandy had died after [they]130-the men who ’d taken her ’d beaten [her]13-mandy to a bloody pulp . [He]10-lewis intended to keep it that way . The mess [they]130-the men who ’d taken her ’d left [her]13-mandy in had required a small amount of plastic surgery , so it was easier to hide [her]13-mandy identity . “ [I]13-mandy ’m just having a drink , and staring over at [[our]1321-our glorious city]1322-our glorious city . The many secrets it hides . ”[13-mandy] “ [[My]13-mandy parents]1323-my parents called again today , ”[13-mandy] [Mandy]13-mandy said , turning toward the phone , which beeped with one message . Since [she]13-mandy ’d come back , [Mandy]13-mandy had declined to see [[her]13-mandy parents]131-her parents . At first it was because [her]13-mandy memory was completely gone . [She]13-mandy did n’t want to remember anything . Of course , as [the doctor]132-the doctor predicted , it came back , and with it the memories of who [she]13-mandy once was . [She]13-mandy still did n’t want to see [[her]13-mandy parents]131-her parents even now , two years after [her]13-mandy rescue . Chapter Four The journey to [[his]10-lewis island]387-his island went without a hitch . [Mandy]13-mandy did n’t talk much , and [Lewis]10-lewis had already figured out why . [She]13-mandy had gone to see [[her]13-mandy parents]131-her parents , and [he]10-lewis was guessing it had n’t gone that well . [She]13-mandy ’d told [him]10-lewis that [he]10-lewis would n’t have any problems from [them]131-her parents anymore . [He]10-lewis wondered what was said , what [she]13-mandy ’d seen . Entering [[his]10-lewis home]386-his home , the windows were open as [Cynthia]28-cynthia , [the housekeeper]443-the housekeeper , had aired [the house]375-the house for [him]10-lewis prior to [him]10-lewis coming . [She]28-cynthia lived on [the main island]445-the main island , and [he]10-lewis ’d hired [her]28-cynthia to keep an eye on [[his]10-lewis home on [[his]10-lewis island]387-his island]446-his home on his island , which was surrounded by beaches and [the beautiful ocean]448-the beautiful ocean . The sunshine was a dream . [He]10-lewis ’d bought [the island]449-the island as a treat for [Mandy]13-mandy after [he]10-lewis made [his]10-lewis first billion . Yes , [he]10-lewis ’d purchased [an island for [her]13-mandy]450-an island for her even before [he]10-lewis ’d found [her]13-mandy . Chapter Ten “ [You]782-you ’re torturing [me]13-mandy on purpose now , ”[13-mandy] [Mandy]13-mandy said . [She]781-she stood in the middle of [the apartment]783-the apartment dressed in some weird ensemble that had feathers peeking out of the back . It was horrible .
